section.heading: E-learning Projects
section.subtitle: Key e-learning and content-development projects based on XML, HTML, Flash, and related technologies.

projects.title: Articulate
projects.description: Development using Articulate Storyline and Rise, SCORM/xAPI, and LMS integration.
roleAndResponsibilities: Work with visual storyboards, multimedia learning assets, and LMS content integration.

projects.title: Sun Micro System â€“ Sun Project
projects.description: Project based on XML/HTML, generating XML/HTML files according to defined standards and guidelines.
roleAndResponsibilities: Generate and integrate XML/HTML files as per standards and guidelines.

projects.title: Knet (Knowledge Net Studio)
projects.description: Thomson Netg e-learning project consisting of hierarchy/Flash elements. Role includes creating hierarchy and mapping audio and visual files.
roleAndResponsibilities: Create hierarchy and map audio and visual files.

projects.title: TMIT
projects.description: Project based on XML/HTML/Flash. Involves creating XML pages as per client requirements/storyboards.
roleAndResponsibilities: Create XML pages as per client requirements/storyboards.

projects.title: Elsevier
projects.description: HTML/Flash-based project. Responsible for creating pages in HTML based on client-provided storyboards.
roleAndResponsibilities: Create pages in HTML based on client-provided storyboards.

projects.title: E-LFH
projects.description: Part of Giuddnti Labs LearnExact suite. Involves components such as Packager and The Lobster for e-learning for healthcare (NHS).
roleAndResponsibilities: E-learning content development using suite components such as Packager and The Lobster.

projects.title: Perkinswill
projects.description: Graphic creation project using Flash. Responsible for creating graphics based on storyboard requirements.
roleAndResponsibilities: Create graphics in Flash as per storyboard.

projects.title: DELL
projects.description: Project based on XML/HTML/Flash. Role includes creating HTML files for pages as per client requirements/storyboards.
roleAndResponsibilities: Create HTML files for pages as per client requirements/storyboards.

projects.title: Oracle
projects.description: Product Developer General Ledger, Alpha Brains. Worked on generating XML pages and audio editing.
roleAndResponsibilities: Generate XML pages and perform audio editing.
